subject: Economy
question_en: What is the official language of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Hindi is the official language of Rajasthan. Rajasthan is located in Northern India and shares its borders with several states, including Madhya Pradesh where Hindi is also an official language. However, Hindi has a larger linguistic dominance in Rajasthan due to its cultural and historical significance.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान भारत के पाश्चात्तम भाषा है। राजस्थान भारत के पाश्चात्तम भाषा है। राजस्थान इसका उपयोगी मूल भाषा है। पहले मूल भाषा है।
